Merge branch 'sd-card-setting' of github.com:frostwire/frostwire-android into sd-card-setting

added new notification when there is an sd card present but user is using internal memory storage. this will teach users about new feature. makes sure notifications are initialized onResume(), not just on fragment creation. Issues to fix on the preferences dialog. Description text of new notification not finished.

dry refactor on the way the notification textviews are initialized, the notification description can now be updated (used on the Saving to memory notification). New SystemUtils method that returns the extSdCard/Android/data/com.frostwire.android dir path. New parameter on RichNotification's XML allows you to underline title (so that you know you can touch it and have something happen, not just a dismissable notification)
Minor UI fix in storage preference dialog.
Fixed logic in StoragePreference dialog. Shows only confirmation dialog when selecting the SD Card option.
